rooms.description: Open-plan living and dining area with Vastu orientation ensuring main entrance is not aligned with the north wall
Connected to living area with open plan, placed in south-eastern part as per Vastu guidelines ensuring positive energy flow
Meditation space integrated; master en-suite bathroom attached on east side to ensure privacy and alignment with Vastu for relaxation
Additional bedroom designed in line with family space, adjacent to the living area for ease of movement.
Another bedroom allocated on the south-eastern side following Vastu guidelines for balance
En-suite bathroom attached to master bedroom

openings.description: Vastu-compliant entrance located on north-east wall, ensuring auspicious energy flow
Balcony integrated into living area for natural light and ventilation
Large windows installed on southern and eastern walls to allow ample sunlight while considering privacy

levels.notes: Brutalist design elements such as exposed concrete, geometric forms and raw materials have been integrated. The penthouse layout is optimized for a family of four with open-plan kitchen-living area ensuring modern living. Local building norms including structural safety and adherence to local zoning regulations are considered in the design.
